inclusion.criterion: previous study between 1997 - 2000, oral glucose tolerance test included
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: family predisposition to diabetes and cardiovascular diseases
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter, multiple prior admissions for UTIs, altered mental status, and urosepsis. The patient is currently being treated for a non-obstructing stone in the L ureter.
